([[Macau]]; 18 April 2004) | World cup apps = 1 | World cup first = 1996 | World cup best = Round 1, [[1996 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1996]] | Regional name = [[AFC Futsal Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 9 | Regional cup first = [[1999 AFC Futsal Championship|1999]] | Regional cup best = First Round }} The Malaysia national futsal team represents Malaysia in international futsal competitions and is controlled by [[Football Association of Malaysia]]. Malaysia once played in the [[FIFA Futsal World Cup]] in 1996.[http://www.rsssf.com/tablesf/futsal-wc.html FIFA Futsal World Cup Overview] ==Tournament Record== ===[[FIFA Futsal World
